LanguageData.FedSuit.label: federation jumpsuit
LanguageData.FedSuit.description: A carbon crystalline fiber jumpsuit for military personnel. It is light and thin, but surprisingly sturdy. It is the uniform of the Federation.
LanguageData.Apparel_Judicator.label: riot gear
LanguageData.Apparel_Judicator.description: A "Judicator" riot gear was produced by Arms Dynamics for Federation human commanders. This is a really great personal armor if you can withstand from scornful eyes of the people.
LanguageData.Apparel_JudicatorH.label: riot gear helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_JudicatorH.description: It is a helmet of the FPC riot gear. If you wear this, you will be an eyesore of your colony.
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGear.label: marksman gear
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGear.description: Arms Dynamics "Condemner" Marksman gear. With joint stabilizer unit, this outfit assure steady aim. Standard issue gear of the Federation Peacebringer assassin corps.
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGearH.label: marksmangear helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGearH.description: It is a helmet of the "Condemner" marksman gear. Integrated target designator guarantees high accuracy.
LanguageData.Apparel_UGCuirass.label: unity guard curaiss
LanguageData.Apparel_UGCuirass.description: Standard issue body armor of the federation unity guards.
LanguageData.Apparel_UGHelmet.label: unity guard helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_UGHelmet.description: Standard issue helmet of the federation unity guards.
LanguageData.Apparel_UGCloak.label: unity guard cloak
LanguageData.Apparel_UGCloak.description: Cloak that usually worn by the federation unity guards. It's more like to ornament than practical outfit.
